did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The Story of Arizona's Admission to Statehood, 1927
did.abstract: Typescript of paper presented to Tucson Women's Club, Feb. 14, 1927, concerning Arizona statehood. Includes bibliography of sources.
